item.title: What Is Responsive Design?
item.description: What is Responsive Design? A way of making websites that can be easily viewed and used on any type of device and size of screen Advantages of Responsive Design Developers only have to create one website, one design, one set of code, and one set of content Better optimized for search (SEO), no longer need to use m-dot websites

item.title: Implementing Responsive Design
item.description: Implementing Responsive Design Add Viewport Meta Tag to your tag Use Media Queries Leverage relative measurement approaches (EMs/REMs or Percentages) instead of pixels
